job.title: Machine Learning Software Engineer / Senior - Lead
job.description:
An ecommerce tech company in Chicago is looking to bring on a hybrid Software & Machine Learning Engineer to work on a variety of computer vision and NLP projects. The role is looking for someone who is very comfortable in Python programming and building out Machine Learning models from scratch, as well as someone who can help deploy their models into production.
This role needs someone who not only has used Machine learning, but also someone who comes from a strong computer engineering background to be able to work closely with the software developers on the full life cycle of the data projects.
This is a true hybrid role between engineering and Machine Learning/Deep Learning- so if you're looking to take on the next step in your career make sure to apply today!
Required Skills & Experience
4+ years professional experience in building web applications, backend infrastructure, data pipelines, and or machine learning models
Experience with Python, Scala, Java, or Go programming
Building data pipelines in PySpark or Spark and scheduling with Airflow
PyData tools like Pandas, Numpy, SkLearn, SciPy, etc.
Deep Learning tools such as PyTorch or Tensorflow
Strong understanding and experience in engineering
Bachelor's Degree in C.S. or similar
Cloud Technologies such as GCP or AWS
Desired Skills & Experience
ML Ops tools such as ML flow and Kubeflow and distributed model training
Kafka, Kinesis, or similar
Experience as a Software or Data Engineer prior to Machine Learning
Experience deploying your own models
The Offer
Competitive Salary: Up to $120-190K/year, DOE
You Will Receive The Following Benefits
Competitive Medical & Health Benefits package
Educational Reimbursement
Collaborative inclusive culture
401(k) with match
Annual bonus
Unlimited and encouraged PTO
Free snacks and beverages
Flexible work schedule
Stock options
Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a full-time basis now and in the future. This position does not offer sponsorship. No C2C or 3rd parties please.
Posted By:
Sydney Weaver
